name: Soccer Marathon World Cup 2022
description:
Hi, this is my simple project , I'v been working on it for a month now , I hope you like it

How to play : 

S : start 

P : pause

q and d  : move left and right

X : shoot

touch the ball with the player and shoot it with x button

enjoy.

game is still in development , so don't judge it very much .
